metadata.name: The Adventurers Text #1
metadata.description: The Adventurers is the first hybrid NFT derived from text trait properties inspired by RPGs and anime and are combined with an evolving artwork visually detailing each hero. Each NFT is considered a scroll representing each hero in text format. The NFT is free to encourage an inclusive participation benefiting the wider NFT community. Hero PFP Avatar NFTs will be free for all 5000 text trait NFT holders. Full body hero NFT will be free for all PFP Avatar NFT holders.
